Name: Thai Lemonade
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer
Instructions: MUDDLE coriander in base of shaker. Add next two ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer.
Review: Lime lemonade with Thai influences courtesy of ginger, almond and coriander.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2005 by Charlotte Voisey, London, England.
